analysis.description:
RandomLedgerService.isRequestPending (/unique_chucks/21/0x870ed69ed12430c6a3d4abdb30c7eeb1918c62b1.sol) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- pendingNumbers[_requestor].renderedNumber == 0 && pendingNumbers[_requestor].waitTime > 0

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/21/0x870ed69ed12430c6a3d4abdb30c7eeb1918c62b1.sol#130-132:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"
Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/21/0x870ed69ed12430c6a3d4abdb30c7eeb1918c62b1.sol#54-60) should be declared external
Mortal.kill (/unique_chucks/21/0x870ed69ed12430c6a3d4abdb30c7eeb1918c62b1.sol#65-70) should be declared external
RandomLedgerService.revealNumber (/unique_chucks/21/0x870ed69ed12430c6a3d4abdb30c7eeb1918c62b1.sol#291-296) should be declared external
RandomLedger.revealNumber (/unique_chucks/21/0x870ed69ed12430c6a3d4abdb30c7eeb1918c62b1.sol#169-170) should be declared external
RandomLedgerService.setMax (/unique_chucks/21/0x870ed69ed12430c6a3d4abdb30c7eeb1918c62b1.sol#193-198) should be declared external
RandomLedgerService.setWaitTime (/unique_chucks/21/0x870ed69ed12430c6a3d4abdb30c7eeb1918c62b1.sol#202-210) should be declared external
RandomLedgerService.setCost (/unique_chucks/21/0x870ed69ed12430c6a3d4abdb30c7eeb1918c62b1.sol#211-213) should be declared external
RandomLedgerService.enableProxy (/unique_chucks/21/0x870ed69ed12430c6a3d4abdb30c7eeb1918c62b1.sol#222-230) should be declared external
RandomLedgerService.removeProxy (/unique_chucks/21/0x870ed69ed12430c6a3d4abdb30c7eeb1918c62b1.sol#230-235) should be declared external
RandomLedgerService.withdraw (/unique_chucks/21/0x870ed69ed12430c6a3d4abdb30c7eeb1918c62b1.sol#238-244) should be declared external
RandomLedgerService.fallback (/unique_chucks/21/0x870ed69ed12430c6a3d4abdb30c7eeb1918c62b1.sol#247-251) should be declared external
RandomLedgerService.canReveal (/unique_chucks/21/0x870ed69ed12430c6a3d4abdb30c7eeb1918c62b1.sol#316-323) should be declared external
RandomLedgerService.getNumber (/unique_chucks/21/0x870ed69ed12430c6a3d4abdb30c7eeb1918c62b1.sol#365-374) should be declared external

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/21/0x870ed69ed12430c6a3d4abdb30c7eeb1918c62b1.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.11 (/unique_chucks/21/0x870ed69ed12430c6a3d4abdb30c7eeb1918c62b1.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/21/0x870ed69ed12430c6a3d4abdb30c7eeb1918c62b1.sol#55-59) is not in mixedCase
